answers.answer: I'm only guessing, but the neck coloring may be acanthosis nigricans (Latin for "dark thickening).  Cause may be diabetes, hormones, internal issues, or family heritage.  As for the face, I can't say.  basically, what you need to do is to see a doctor in person doe proper evaluation and treatment, if available.Best.Dr. Rockoff
